fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cause a player to fade into non-existence.
- Cause all your visitors to fade into non-existence. Costs 2 life energy.
- Send yourself into non-existence. Costs 2 life energy.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sending other players into non-existence will cause them to die without a cause of death, will, or role shown.
- Sending yourself into non-existence will do the same, but automatically revive yourself after a full day of non-existence.
- You start with 1 life energy. You gain 1 for each person you kill. You do not gain any for killing yourself.
- If you are attacked with any life energy, consume 1 life energy to automatically block the attack, **regardless of the attack's value.** If this is from a limited use attack, you will cause the attacker to lose a charge.
- If you have no life energy left and are attacked, you have a one-time use Basic defense auto-use shield. Once this is depleted, and you are attacked without life energy, you will die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
